decision_conditions: It is recommended that the, these trees as shown on the Havering TPO plan7/90 can be pruned as set out in the itemised schedule;
Ash tree T6, right of driveway, reduce height by 4m, reduce branches over neighbouring property back to the trunk, reducing branches over the driveway by 2-3m.
Ash tree T7 - reduce branches round service cable to give clearance 1-2m.
Sycamore T10 removing bough with dieback overhanging the lawn which has previously been reduced (lower left side), removing corresponding branch on the lower right hand side to balance.
Prunus tree T11 - fell to ground level.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out as an overall reduction, so that the tree's crown remains balanced.
To ensure that the tree's stability is maintained and in the interests of public amenity.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
To prevent the accumulation of consents.

Having considered the particular circumstances of the case and the position of the Prunus tree T11 for which consent to fell has been granted the Council has decided that it will not be necessary to replace the tree.
The request to prune Ash tree T5 is incorrect and is T6 on Havering's TPO 7/90, Ash tree T5 was pruned in 2016 TO148.16
description:
Ash tree T5, right of driveway, reduce height by 4m, reduce branches over neighbouring property back to the trunk, reducing branches over the driveway by 2-3m. Ashtree T7 - reduce branches round service cable to give clearance 1-2m. Sycamore T10 removing bough with digback overhanging the lawn which has previously been reduced (over left side), removing corresponding branch on the lower right hand side to balance.
Prune tree T11 - fell to ground level, reason for - ash tree by drive touching next doors roof. Ash lawn clear round cable. Sycamore- to minimise overhang over lawn/light issue. Prune tree - fell/tree over mature bad specimen - had lots of lime fallings.
